scripts.test: export INFLUXDB_HOST="$(docker inspect --format '{{ .NetworkSettings.IPAddress }}' influxdb)" && npm run compile && npm run test-compile && mocha ./app/target/test
scripts.int: export INFLUXDB_HOST="$(docker inspect --format '{{ .NetworkSettings.IPAddress }}' influxdb)" && npm run compile && npm run int-compile && mocha ./app/target/integration
scripts.influxtest: export INFLUXDB_HOST="$(docker inspect --format '{{ .NetworkSettings.IPAddress }}' influxdb)" && npm run compile && node ./app/target/src/influxtest.js
scripts.test:james: export INFLUXDB_HOST="$(docker inspect --format '{{ .NetworkSettings.IPAddress }}' influxdb)" && mocha --colors --compilers js:babel-register ./app/main/test/**/*
scripts.int:james: export INFLUXDB_HOST="$(docker inspect --format '{{ .NetworkSettings.IPAddress }}' influxdb)" && mocha --colors --compilers js:babel-register ./app/main/integration/**
scripts.test:all: export INFLUXDB_HOST="$(docker inspect --format '{{ .NetworkSettings.IPAddress }}' influxdb)" && mocha --colors --compilers js:babel-register ./app/main/integration/**/* ./app/main/test/**/*
